function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE

product shortages and stockouts"},{"name":"Increased inventory levels due to anticipated higher demand for rejectionist customers"},{"name":"Panic buying behavior due to the pandemic"},{"name":"Panic buying of essential goods leading to scarcity and price increases"},{"name":"Panic buying and hoarding during the pandemic"},{"name":"Market segment with low perception of threat and defensive avoidance"},{"name":"Panic buying as a maladaptive response to the pandemic"},{"name":"Panic buying and stockpiling"},{"name":"Employees facing financial insecurity due to covid-19 impacting employment and housing"},{"name":"Shift in priorities from esteem and self-actualization to meeting basic needs during high-stress situations like the covid-19 pandemic"},{"name":"Impact on day-to-day livelihoods and savings may lead to economic vulnerability and inability to access vital resources like water."},{"name":"People working through illness due to need to make a habits and reliance on non-contact administrative services"},{"name":"Difficult decisions under uncertainty and time constraints"},{"name":"Misallocation of resources leading to inadequate supply of and their impact on recreational activity assessment during lockdown."},{"name":"Unemployment due to covid-19-related furlough"}]}
